name: places/ChIJvYAsbY0Z2jERqAXNqB3iKHI/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNBbnRpaGJnEAE
text:
{'text': 'Shaw Theatres Lido: A Mostly Positive Experience with Some Quirks (4/5 Stars)

Rating:

• Atmosphere: 4/5 (Clean and modern, but the theater layout has some unusual quirks)
• Seating: 3.5/5 (Snug seats with limited legroom, but not unbearably uncomfortable)
• Sound Quality: 5/5 (Excellent sound quality, immersing us in the film)
• Service: 4/5 (Friendly and helpful staff)

Overall: 4/5

Donkey and I spontaneously decided to catch a movie at Shaw Theatres Lido, hoping to see “No.2,” without checking the website beforehand. We were disappointed to find it wasn’t playing there, highlighting the need to check the website in the future for clearer communication of film availability at specific locations. However, we quickly switched to “Detective Chinatown” and found our seats in Theatre 7.

Theatre 7 is smaller than average and has an unusual layout, requiring a bit of a walk to reach the upper seating area. However, the sound quality was excellent, immersing us in the film. The movie itself was enjoyable. Although the seats were a bit snug, with limited legroom and fixed armrests, they weren’t unbearably uncomfortable. The ticket and food counters were located at opposite ends of the building, which was a minor inconvenience. The staff were friendly and helpful.

Despite the minor inconveniences of the theater’s layout and seating, the excellent sound quality, enjoyable movie, and friendly staff contributed to a mostly positive experience. We give Shaw Theatres Lido a 4 out of 5 stars for this visit. While we’d prefer more spacious seating in future visits, we’d still consider returning to Lido, especially if our preferred movie is playing there.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJvYAsbY0Z2jERqAXNqB3iKHI/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VPX2dfNXlDcjZXNlJ3EAE
text: {'text': 'One of the oldest cinemas. Has IMAX and a nice chill viewing area when you come up the escalator. Macs also available.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

text: {'text': 'Great cinema by Orchard Road. You can get popcorn, candy but also easier fast Food here. There is the option of wider seats. Student and over 55 prices on off peak hours. Great selection of moveies shown here.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJvYAsbY0Z2jERqAXNqB3iKHI/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURnb3NtMXhRRRAB
text: {'text': "First time IMAX experience. It was great. Full field of vision is screen only. Its so large and immersive.. Worth watch IMAX movies.\n\nSeat comfort could've been better.", 'languageCode': 'en'}
